scripts.start: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --servedir=dist --loader:.tsx=tsx --watch
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/index.js --minify --loader:.tsx=tsx && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico
